Diamond - Class in <Unnamed>
This class maintains information for drawing a Diamond and extends Polygon.

draw(Graphics) - Method in interface Drawable
This method defines how to draw the object.
draw(Graphics) - Method in class Oval
This method takes a graphics object to perform the drawing, places the points of the oval and fills it with the color if filled is true.
draw(Graphics) - Method in class Polygon
This method defines how to draw a polygon, by constructing a convex shape with the location of the points as vertices, and fills in the space with the color if filed is true.
